item.title: What's Going On With Rezolve AI Stock Tuesday Morning?
item.description: Rezolve AI PLC (NASDAQ:RZLV) shares are trading lower on Tuesday. The company announced updated revenue guidance for fiscal 2025 and 2026. read more

item.title: Apple Launches Subscription Based Apple Creator Studio
item.description: Apple traded flat Tuesday after launching Apple Creator Studio, a new subscription bundle that expands its creator-focused software lineup. read more

item.title: What's Going On With Offerpad Stock Tuesday?
item.description: Offerpad Solutions Inc. (OPAD) tumbles after announcing a stock sale agreement with institutional buyers for $18 million. read more

item.title: The 20% Coffee Spike That Proves Inflation Isn't Done With You
item.description: Inflation looked calm in December, but food, housing, utilities and select items kept climbing, keeping pressure on household budgets. read more
